snippet.title: Classic Muncher - Amstrad CPC Gameplay
snippet.description:
Considering that the original Pac-Man never had an official Amstrad CPC conversion, it's understandable that we saw a lot of clones for it. Classic Muncher, written by Nick Jones and published by Bubble Bus Software, is one of those clones. I find it interesting that this clone has different maze layouts per level, but I also find it funny that when you have the power pellet, you can also camp at the ghosts' spawn point to get easy points. While the control scheme is gonna take some getting used to, Classic Muncher is a pretty decent alternative for Amstrad CPC owners.

Classic Muncher (C) Bubble Bus Software
Also available on ZX Spectrum
